author: vors
body:
Fixes master

Current error in master is introduced by updated MMI package

```
Could not load type 'Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Native.MI_UserCredentials' from assembly 'Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure, 
Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35' because it contains an object field at offset 4 that is incorrectly 
aligned or overlapped by a non-object field.
```

Error manifests itself only on `-Publish` builds (layout-dependent).

cc @daxian-dbw @johnkord

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Is this failure happening in Linux build?

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
@daxian-dbw yes, Linux and OS X.

I don't know why CI didn't catch it on PR build :(
- PR build: https://travis-ci.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/builds/29051169
- Build from master, after the merge: https://travis-ci.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/builds/29051717

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Looks like it cause all auto completion tests to fail. I did notice type name completion on Linux not working yesterday, but thought it's related to my box since PR tests passed.

title: Revert back to old MMI package, until we fix regression
